bibl.title: BIENNIAL REPORT OF THE Auditor of Public Accounts TO THE GOVERNOR OF THE STATE OF NEBRASKA

respStmt.name: OCLC Online Computer Library Center Inc.

body.p:
Biennial report of the Auditor of Public Accounts to the governor of the state of Nebraska [blank] State of Nebraska, Office of Auditor of Public Accounts, Lincoln, December 1, 1890 To his excellency Hon. John M. Thayer, Governor of the State of Nebraska Respecfully submitted T.H. Benton, Auditor Public Accounts [blank] Report Statement No. 1 Showing the balance of each fund remaining in the State Treasury November 30, 1888, the receipts and disbursements to November 30, 1890, inclusive and the balance remaining in the State Treasury November 30, 1890. Statement No. 2 Detailed statement showing the Receipts and disbursements of the State Treasuru from November 30th, 1888 to November 30, 1890. Sinking Fund Permanent School Fund Temporary School Fund Interest of Bonds Permanent University Fund Temporary University Fund University Library Fund Agricultural College Endowment Fund Penitentiary Fund State Bonds Fund Hospital for insane fund Capitol building fund Reform School Building Fund Normal Building Fund Normal Interest Fund Normal Library Fund Normal Endowment Fund State Library Fund Permanent Saline Fund Saline Land Stick Yards Fund Institute for feeble minded fund Live Stock Indemnity Fund Interest Charged County Treasurers Balance in the Treasury Nov. 30, 1890, none. Statement No. 3 Showing the State Indebtedness and Resources of the Various Funds November 30, 1890. General Fund. Total Resources. Sinking Fund. Permanent School Fund. County Bonds Temporary School Fund. Permanent University Fund. Temporary University Fund. Agricultural College Endowment Fund. Penitentiary Fund. Bond Fund. Hospital for the Insane Fund. Capitol Building Fund. Reform School Building Fund. Normal Building Fund. Normal Interest Fund. Normal Library Fund. Normal Endownment Fund. State Library Fund. Permanent Saline Fund. Saline Fund. Saline Land Stock Yarkds Fund. Institute for feeble minded fund.
